welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oyama, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, historic temples, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Oyama has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: 富士見食堂
restaurants.description: 富士見食堂 is a teishoku restaurant located in 山北町.
restaurants.address: 谷峨925-2 (鮎沢PA 上り線), 山北町, 神奈川県, 258-0115

restaurants.name: 足柄古道万葉うどん
restaurants.description: 足柄古道万葉うどん is a udon restaurant located in 南足柄市.
restaurants.address: 矢倉沢2393, 南足柄市, 神奈川県, 251-0136

restaurants.name: Sawayaka (さわやか)
restaurants.description: Sawayaka (さわやか) is a steakhouse located in 御殿場市.
restaurants.address: 深沢1312 (御殿場プレミアム・アウトレット), 御殿場市, 静岡県, 412-0023

restaurants.name: 沼津魚がし鮨
restaurants.description: 沼津魚がし鮨 is a sushi restaurant located in 御殿場市.
restaurants.address: 深沢1312 (御殿場プレミアム・アウトレット HILL SIDE AREA), 御殿場市, 静岡県, 412-0023

restaurants.name: Shake Shack
restaurants.description: Shake Shack is a fast food restaurant located in 御殿場市.
restaurants.address: 深沢1312 (御殿場プレミアムアウトレット), 御殿場市, 静岡県, 412-0023
